SELECT bc.customer_name, t.collect_pallet_code, nvl( ( SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = t.COLLECT_TRANSPORT_STAFF_ID ), t.COLLECT_TRANSPORT_STAFF_ID ) COLLECT_TRANSPORT_STAFF, nvl( ( SELECT user_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = t.COLLECT_STAFF_ID ), t.COLLECT_STAFF_ID ) COLLECT_STAFF, bs.stage_code, bs.stage_name, t.barcode, oo.order_out_code, t.merge_barcode, CASE WHEN t.collect_stage_id IS NOT NULL THEN '已集运' ELSE '未集运' END gather_state FROM ( SELECT * FROM cmd_out co WHERE co.barcode != 'N/A' AND concat( co.order_id, co.cmd_line_no ) IN ( SELECT concat( min( t.order_id ), min( t.cmd_line_no ) ) FROM cmd_out t WHERE t.wh_id = 1000000002 GROUP BY t.barcode ) ) t INNER JOIN order_out oo ON oo.order_out_id = t.order_id INNER JOIN bas_customer bc ON bc.customer_id = oo.customer_id LEFT JOIN bas_stage bs ON bs.stage_id = t.collect_stage_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND oo.order_out_code = #{order_out_code}
AND t.collect_staff_id IS NOT NULL
AND t.collect_staff_id IS NULL

SELECT bs.stage_code, t.qty FROM ( SELECT * FROM cmd_out co WHERE co.barcode != 'N/A' AND concat( co.order_id, co.cmd_line_no ) IN ( SELECT concat( min( t.order_id ), min( t.cmd_line_no ) ) FROM cmd_out t WHERE t.wh_id = #{wh_id} GROUP BY t.barcode ) ) t INNER JOIN order_out oo ON oo.order_out_id = t.order_id INNER JOIN bas_customer bc ON bc.customer_id = oo.customer_id LEFT JOIN bas_stage bs ON bs.stage_id = t.collect_stage_id WHERE bc.CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customer_code} AND t.collect_staff_id IS NOT NULL
